name: Ad Agency Tycoon
description:
Ad Agency Tycoon is an Advertising Agency simulator set in the 60's. You are in charge of a new company and your goal is to conquer the market and to become a benchmark in the advertising world. Begin your journey working for small clients, build the necessary reputation to develop your agency, gain the public and the big enterprises attention.

The Golden Age of publicity

Begin your career in the 60's
Your career begins at the Golden Age of publicity. Does your company have what it takes to reach the top of the marketing companies?

Create your advertisement
Do you think your ad should be funny? Artistic or aggressive? Music or voice over? Choose how your ad must be and see if your combination attracts the public attention.

See your results
Different combinations generate different propagandas. Ad Agency Tycoon allows you to visualize the campaign resulted from your choices, and how the final result affects the public.

Build up your business
Get money, build your reputation and upgrade your agency. Get assets to make your workspace more comfortable and efficient, hire employees to build the perfect team and eventually, move to a brand new office!

Features

  • Start in the 60's, Publicity's Golden Age
  • Create advertising campaigns of your liking
  • See your finished advertisement
  • Get the audience feedback to improve your advertising skills
  • Build your reputation and get the attention of the greatest enterprises
  • Buy assets and improve your workspace
  • Hire staff and upgrade your agency



We, developers, know how frustrating it is not to know what to expect in the future of an Early Access game. That's why Ad Agency Tycoon has a Roadmap. The Roadmap contains all the expected future implementations (no spoilers), known bugs list and developers' comments. This way, we will be closer to those that have acquired the game with the intention of supporting the development.
